## Input class

Class for an input with an optional field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Input 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [appendField(field, opt\_name)](./blockly.input.appendfield.md) |  | Add a field (or label from string), and all prefix and suffix fields, to the end of the input's field row. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.input.dispose.md) |  | Sever all links to this input. |
|  [getShadowDom()](./blockly.input.getshadowdom.md) |  | Returns the XML representation of the connection's shadow block. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.input.getsourceblock.md) |  | Get the source block for this input. |
|  [init()](./blockly.input.init.md) |  | Initialize the fields on this input. |
|  [insertFieldAt(index, field, opt\_name)](./blockly.input.insertfieldat.md) |  | Inserts a field (or label from string), and all prefix and suffix fields, at the location of the input's field row. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.input.isvisible.md) |  | Gets whether this input is visible or not. |
|  [removeField(name, opt\_quiet)](./blockly.input.removefield.md) |  | Remove a field from this input. |
|  [setAlign(align)](./blockly.input.setalign.md) |  | Change the alignment of the connection's field(s). |
|  [setCheck(check)](./blockly.input.setcheck.md) |  | Change a connection's compatibility. |
|  [setShadowDom(shadow)](./blockly.input.setshadowdom.md) |  | Changes the connection's shadow block. |
